item.description:
Are you ready to celebrate the New Year again? Well if you are join us at PF Chang's in the Prudential (NOT the Transportation Bldg) in the bar area on the ground level.

This will be the first day of the Chinese New Year and I thought this would be a good excuse to meetup. Corny, I know but how much convincing do you need to hang out with cool folks.

PF Chang Prudential


Encourage you to pay as you order or maintain your own tab
item.how_to_find_us: I should be the only one wearing a 'Happy New Year' tiara.
item.why: You missed celebrating this past New Year's Eve because you were sick, tired, not in the mood, worked, it was too cold, or whatever other reason you had.
item.name: Happy New Year Again at the PRUDENTIAL PF Chang
